tweet: Please intensify your prayers as this battle is not over yet, we are about half way through.
But I refuse the negative reports and proclaim in Jesus Name, all is well.
And to be honest, this is the hardest thing that I personally had to go through with a child.
They continue to try to put medicine up her nose, up her bum; as u can imagine the traumatic problems that brings for Abigail + her mother.
Today is Thursday; they have moved my wife and baby again to an isolation room, because now they think she has an infection.
